name: Memoirs of Murder: Resorting to Revenge Collector's Edition
name_original: Memoirs of Murder: Resorting to Revenge Collector's Edition
description:
Memoirs of Murder: Resorting to Revenge Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It came out on 15-12-2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Memoirs of Murder: Resorting to Revenge Collector's Edition is available on PC.
